Docs.summary: Represents a connection to a data store in a design tool. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> object represents a connection to a data store in the design tool. Typically a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> object is returned as part of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.Connections%2A> property, and is created either by reading the application's configuration file or by calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.BuildConnection%2A> method.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A> property will be `true` if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> object was read from the application's configuration file, or if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection> object was written to the application's configuration file by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.Name%2A> property is set to the name of the connection as defined in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.Name%2A> property contains the name that identifies a specific connection in an application configuration file or a list of data connections. When the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.IsConfigured%2A> property is `true`, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.DesignerDataConnection.Name%2A> property is used as the `name` attribute in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) configuration element, or is returned from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Data.IDataEnvironment.ConfigureConnection%2A> method.
